i never had a soup that looked or tasted like this . it was terrific .

output.sentences: Wine and candles can be excellent aids in setting the mood for a date.
Start your dinner with a light but flavorful salad.
Then move onto a heartier entry, like soup.
Chosing a vintage wine full of flavor can bring an extra level of class your meal.
Finish off with a dessert and wine pair and your date will surely be a hit.
